message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1050000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1080000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I believe the product's value warrants a premium price. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're looking for.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to offer $1060000 for the product.
